J5IXN2S-M1.title: City of God (Cidade de Deus)
J5IXN2S-M1.synopsis: In the slums of Rio, a young photographer chronicles the rise of a ruthless gang leader in a gripping tale of survival and consequence.

J5IXN2S-M2.title: Elite Squad (Tropa de Elite)
J5IXN2S-M2.synopsis: A BOPE captain in Rio de Janeiro struggles with corruption and violence while training new recruits to take on the city’s criminal underworld.

J5IXN2S-M3.title: The Trespasser (O Invasor)
J5IXN2S-M3.synopsis: Two partners hire a hitman to solve a problem, only to see their lives spiral as the outsider infiltrates their world.

QK6BJEH.title: Rashomon
QK6BJEH.synopsis: In medieval Japan, conflicting accounts of a violent crime unfold, exploring the elusiveness of truth and the nature of human perception.

RHZT7OU.title: Cure
RHZT7OU.synopsis: A detective investigates a string of baffling murders connected by a hypnotic suggestion, blurring the line between the mind and malevolence.

HEABYHU.title: Perfect Blue
HEABYHU.synopsis: A pop idol’s transition to acting spirals into paranoia as her identity fractures, culminating in a tense psychological mystery.

KEUNBBE-M1.title: El cartel de los sapos (The Snitch Cartel)
KEUNBBE-M1.synopsis: La historia de un joven que asciende en el mundo del narcotráfico colombiano y enfrenta traiciones, violencia y el peso de sus decisiones.

KEUNBBE-M2.title: El Mariachi
KEUNBBE-M2.synopsis: Un mariachi se ve envuelto por error en una guerra entre criminales cuando es confundido con un asesino a sueldo.

KEUNBBE-M3.title: Miss Bala
KEUNBBE-M3.synopsis: Una joven aspirante a reina de belleza se ve atrapada en una red criminal y debe luchar por sobrevivir.

H7OTLA5.title: Como agua para chocolate
H7OTLA5.synopsis: Una historia de amor prohibido y tradición familiar donde la cocina se convierte en lenguaje del corazón.

UG4E096.title: Tres metros sobre el cielo
UG4E096.synopsis: Dos jóvenes de mundos opuestos viven una pasión intensa que desafía las reglas sociales.

W1JJ4IX.title: Amarte Duele
W1JJ4IX.synopsis: Un amor juvenil marcado por la diferencia de clases y las presiones familiares.

316PP98-M1.title: El laberinto del fauno (Pan's Labyrinth)
316PP98-M1.synopsis: En la posguerra española, una niña descubre un mundo fantástico y oscuro mientras intenta escapar de la brutal realidad que la rodea.

316PP98-M2.title: Vuelven (Tigers Are Not Afraid)
316PP98-M2.synopsis: Niños huérfanos por la violencia del crimen organizado usan la imaginación y la valentía para sobrevivir en una ciudad mexicana.

316PP98-M3.title: Cronos
316PP98-M3.synopsis: Un misterioso artefacto otorga juventud y sed de sangre a un anticuario, desencadenando consecuencias oscuras.

C645274.title: Blade Runner 2049
C645274.synopsis: A new blade runner unearths a long-buried secret that leads him to former blade runner Rick Deckard.

NEXFOEW.title: Arrival
NEXFOEW.synopsis: A linguistics professor leads a team of investigators to communicate with extraterrestrial visitors.

6GDEUR6.title: Dune: Part One

crew.writer: Jon Spaihts, Denis Villeneuve & Eric Roth

6GDEUR6.synopsis: Paul Atreides must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and people.

0VZ1EK7.title: Space Sweepers
0VZ1EK7.synopsis: In the year 2092, a crew of space junk collectors discover a humanoid robot known to be a weapon of mass destruction and get involved in a risky business deal.

06WTCTP.title: Alienoid
06WTCTP.synopsis: As aliens attempt to manage imprisoned alien criminals on Earth, timelines collide between present-day and Goryeo-era sorcerers.

XG6AL0S.title: The Host
XG6AL0S.synopsis: A monstrous creature emerges from the Han River, abducting a young girl and forcing her family into a desperate rescue.

I60AQOY.title: La Planète Sauvage
I60AQOY.synopsis: On a distant planet, tiny humans struggle to survive under the rule of giant blue aliens.

MA52C0J.title: Je t'aime, je t'aime
MA52C0J.synopsis: A man participates in a time travel experiment that sends him into a loop of fragmented memories.

VWRD1XB.title: Mr. Nobody
VWRD1XB.synopsis: The last mortal on Earth reflects on the many lives he could have led based on choices he made.

NO0JEQD.title: Insomnia
NO0JEQD.synopsis: A seasoned detective investigates a murder in a sunlit Norwegian town, battling sleeplessness and moral ambiguity as the case unravels.

WNGY6BL.title: Headhunters (Hodejegerne)
WNGY6BL.synopsis: A corporate headhunter who moonlights as an art thief becomes entangled in a deadly game after targeting a former mercenary.

56PETUI.title: Thelma
56PETUI.synopsis: A shy student discovers unsettling, unexplained powers as a new romance stirs buried memories and family secrets.

0D4SRVQ.title: Aferim!
0D4SRVQ.synopsis: In 19th-century Wallachia, a constable and his son set out to track down a runaway Roma slave, embarking on a journey that exposes the harsh realities and humor of the era.

LVFFT7M.title: Mihai Viteazul
LVFFT7M.synopsis: An epic chronicle of Michael the Brave, the 16th-century ruler who briefly united Wallachia, Transylvania, and Moldavia, told through grand battles and political intrigue.

HZ9UEN8.title: Comoara (The Treasure)
HZ9UEN8.synopsis: A father and his neighbor search for a rumored treasure in a country garden, finding quiet humor and small adventures along the way.

Y4V328M.title: Mar adentro
Y4V328M.synopsis: Based on a true story, a man fights for his right to end his life with dignity after a diving accident leaves him quadriplegic.

ETAATNO.title: Hable con ella
ETAATNO.synopsis: Two men form an unlikely friendship while caring for the women they love who are in comas.

H3V2GPF.title: Todo sobre mi madre
H3V2GPF.synopsis: A grieving mother searches for her late son's father, encountering a tapestry of women whose lives intersect with hers.

M-97PX0R3-001.title: Arn: Tempelriddaren
M-97PX0R3-001.synopsis: A Swedish nobleman trained by the Knights Templar must navigate love and duty during the Crusades.

M-97PX0R3-002.title: Hamilton: I nationens intresse
M-97PX0R3-002.synopsis: Agent Carl Hamilton becomes entangled in a high-stakes international arms plot threatening Sweden.

M-97PX0R3-003.title: Den blomstertid nu kommer (The Unthinkable)
M-97PX0R3-003.synopsis: As Sweden faces mysterious attacks, a man returns home, confronting past love and family amidst chaos.

6XL4BXQ.title: Solaris
6XL4BXQ.synopsis: A psychologist is sent to a space station orbiting the planet Solaris to investigate a series of mysterious occurrences.

Z8VHFS4.title: Stalker
Z8VHFS4.synopsis: A guide leads two men through the mysterious Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

26E0W2H.title: Hard to Be a God
26E0W2H.synopsis: On a distant planet stuck in a perpetual medieval state, an Earth observer struggles not to interfere.

LNO1QYH-01.title: Spirited Away
LNO1QYH-01.synopsis: A young girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, where humans are transformed into beasts.

LNO1QYH-02.title: Princess Mononoke
LNO1QYH-02.synopsis: A prince becomes entangled in the struggle between the forest gods and humans who consume its resources.

LNO1QYH-03.title: Howl's Moving Castle
LNO1QYH-03.synopsis: A young woman cursed by a witch seeks her freedom with the help of a mysterious wizard and his moving castle.

VC9L8V4.title: The Wailing
VC9L8V4.synopsis: A police officer investigates a series of mysterious killings in a rural village after the arrival of a stranger, as a sinister force descends upon the community.

XM03ZP7.title: Train to Busan
XM03ZP7.synopsis: Passengers fight for survival on a high-speed train to Busan as a sudden zombie outbreak overwhelms South Korea.

T0RYARA.title: A Tale of Two Sisters
T0RYARA.synopsis: Two sisters return home from a mental institution to an unsettling stepmother and a house filled with secrets and lingering trauma.

0FXWA82.title: Anatomie d'une chute
0FXWA82.synopsis: A celebrated writer confronts the unraveling truth around a mysterious death in the French Alps.

DJP29MO.title: Ne le dis à personne
DJP29MO.synopsis: Years after his wife's disappearance, a doctor receives a shocking clue that pulls him into a web of secrets.

YIQ64PW.title: Caché
YIQ64PW.synopsis: An upper-middle-class couple is tormented by anonymous surveillance tapes exposing buried guilt.

TA6HUOW.title: A Separation
TA6HUOW.synopsis: When a married couple faces an impossible choice between leaving Iran for a better life and staying for the wellbeing of a parent, a separation sets off a chain of events that reveals deep societal and personal tensions.

QCN8FOP.title: Children of Heaven
QCN8FOP.synopsis: A young boy and his sister devise a plan to share a single pair of shoes after he loses her only pair, leading to a heartwarming tale of perseverance and sibling love.

9YUOVD3.title: A Dragon Arrives!
9YUOVD3.synopsis: A detective’s investigation into a mysterious death at a remote desert graveyard spirals into a surreal web of legends, science, and myth.

B-KITFA7K-001.special_requests: Please seat child next to adult.
